entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight with 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early in the evening. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 25 in the evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CDT Saturday 1 April 2023
